title: Mark Cavendish Gets Slapped Wrist From UCI After Tour de France Record-Breaking Sprint
content:
Governing body issues warning to Cavendish, Philipsen for not holding sprint lines as tension mounts over safety of Tour's mass sprints.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish Gets Slapped Wrist From UCI After Tour de France Record-Breaking Sprint on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
